item.title: 美国非农数据削弱美联储降息预期，亚洲股市犹豫不决，美元走强
item.description: 周一，亚洲股市开盘低迷，美元走强，因为投资者在又一份井喷式的就业报告出炉后权衡美国联邦储备委员会何时会开始降息。【原文：Asian shares started the week on a subdued note on Monday, while the dollar firmed as investors weighed when the U.S. Federal Reserve will start cutting rates in the wake of yet another blowout jobs report.】

item.title: 解说员：关于西南发动机罩问题，您了解多少？
item.description: 周日，美国西南航空公司一架波音 737-800 飞机在丹佛起飞时，发动机罩脱落并击中了机翼襟翼，促使联邦航空管理局展开调查。【原文：An engine cowling on a Southwest Airlines Boeing 737-800 fell off on Sunday during takeoff in Denver and struck the wing flap, prompting the Federal Aviation Administration to open an investigation.】

item.title: 澳大利亚澳洲航空公司扩展飞行常客忠诚计划
item.description: 澳洲航空公司（Qantas Airways）周一扩大了其飞行常客计划，增加了2000万个可通过积分购买的奖励座位。【原文：Qantas Airways expanded its frequent flyer programme on Monday, offering access to 20 million more reward seats that can be purchased through points, as the Australian carrier plans to spend more on customers in a bid to fix its battered reputation.】

item.title: 美国非农就业人数大增，美元风头正劲
item.description: 周一亚洲交易时段，美元坚挺但走势疲软，原因是投资者在上周公布巨额非农就业数据后期待着美国通胀数据的公布，同时国债收益率也创下了 12 月份的新高。【原文：The dollar was firm but sluggish in Asian trading on Monday as investors looked ahead to U.S. inflation data after the big payrolls number last week, and as Treasury yields reached for December highs.】

item.title: 澳大利亚提议对超市实施强制性行为准则，并处以数百万美元罚款
item.description: 澳大利亚一家独立的政府审查机构周一表示，如果供应商和种植者没有得到公平对待，澳大利亚的大型超市可能会面临高达 1,000 万澳元（660 万美元）的罚款，该审查机构同时建议强制执行自愿性食品杂货行为准则。【原文：Australia's major supermarkets could face fines of up to A$10 million ($6.6 million) if suppliers and growers are not treated fairly, an independent government review said on Monday, as it proposed to make a voluntary grocery code of conduct mandatory.】

item.title: 日本央行上田称目标是简化政策框架
item.description: 日本央行行长上田一夫周一表示，让央行的货币政策框架更简单、更易懂是他去年4月执掌央行时的目标之一。【原文：Bank of Japan Governor Kazuo Ueda said on Monday that making the central bank's monetary policy framework simpler and easier to understand was among goals he had in mind when taking the bank's helm in April last year.】

item.title: 巴西法官就马斯克涉及社交媒体公司 X 的妨害公务行为展开调查
item.description: 根据一份法庭文件，巴西最高法院法官亚历山大-德-莫赖斯（Alexandre de Moraes）周日开始调查埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）在社交媒体公司 X 上妨碍司法公正的行为。【原文：Brazilian Supreme Court Justice Alexandre de Moraes on Sunday opened an inquiry into Elon Musk for obstruction of justice involving social media company X, according to a court document.】

item.title: 消息人士称，巴西总统卢拉就巴西国家石油公司首席执行官的未来召开会议
item.description: 两名消息人士告诉路透社，巴西总统路易斯-伊纳西奥-卢拉-达席尔瓦周日晚间召集三名内阁部长开会，决定是否撤换巴西国营石油公司首席执行官让-保罗-普拉特斯。【原文：President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva called a meeting on Sunday evening with three cabinet ministers that could decide on whether to replace the chief executive of Brazil's state-run oil company Petrobras Jean Paul Prates, two sources told Reuters.】

item.title: 中国称电动汽车企业不依赖补贴获得竞争优势
item.description: 中国商务部长王文涛周日在巴黎表示，中国的电动汽车公司并不依赖补贴来获得竞争优势，美国和欧洲对中国 "产能过剩 "的指责是毫无根据的。【原文：China's electric vehicle companies do not rely on subsidies to gain a competitive advantage and accusations by the U.S. and Europe of "overcapacity" are groundless, Commerce Minister Wang Wentao said on Sunday in Paris.】

item.title: 中国世茂因未能支付 2.02 亿美元贷款面临清算诉讼
item.description: 中国房地产开发商世茂集团周一表示，中国建设银行（亚洲）已就一笔 15.795 亿港元（约合 2.0175 亿美元）的债务对其提出清盘申请。【原文：Chinese property developer Shimao Group said on Monday that China Construction Bank (Asia) had filed a liquidation petition against it over a financial obligation of HK$1,579.5 million ($201.75 million).】

item.title: 日本 2 月实际工资连续第 23 个月下降
item.description: 周一的数据显示，2月份日本工人的实际工资连续第23个月下降，表明物价上涨对消费者的消费欲望造成了持续压力。【原文：Japanese workers' real wages fell in February for a 23rd consecutive month, data showed on Monday, suggesting higher prices kept up pressure on consumers' spending appetite.】

item.title: 中东地缘政治紧张局势缓解，油价下跌
item.description: 由于以色列从加沙南部撤出更多士兵，并承诺就六个月冲突中可能出现的停火进行新的谈判，中东紧张局势有所缓和，油价在周一亚洲早盘交易中下跌了1%。【原文：Oil prices slipped 1% in early Asian trade on Monday as tensions in the Middle East eased after Israel withdrew more soldiers from southern Gaza and committed to fresh talks on a potential ceasefire in the six-month conflict.】

item.title: 早间竞价市场关注盘整而非投降
item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】

item.title: 巴特勒工业公司与 Onepoint 一起加入 Atos 救援联盟
item.description: 总部位于巴黎的巴特勒工业公司（Butler Industries）周日在一份声明中说，该公司的主要股东 Onepoint 正在加入一个财团，以拯救陷入困境的 IT 咨询公司阿托斯（Atos）。【原文：Paris-based Butler Industries is joining a consortium to rescue distressed IT consulting firm Atos , the company's leading shareholder Onepoint said on Sunday in a statement.】

item.title: 美国联邦航空局称西南航空波音飞机发动机罩在起飞时脱落
item.description: 美国联邦航空管理局周日称，西南航空公司一架飞机在机组人员报告发动机整流罩在起飞时脱落并撞到机翼襟翼后返回丹佛国际机场。【原文：The U.S. Federal Aviation Administration on Sunday said a Southwest Airlines airplane returned to Denver International Airport after the crew reported the engine cowling fell off during takeoff and struck the wing flap.】

item.title: 马斯克质疑巴西封锁某些 X 账户的命令
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）正在对巴西最高法院法官的一项决定提出质疑，该法官命令他的社交媒体平台 X（前身为 Twitter）封禁某些账户。【原文：Elon Musk is challenging a decision by a Supreme Court justice in Brazil who ordered his social media platform X, formerly known as Twitter, to block certain accounts, and he called on Sunday for the judge's resignation.】

item.title: 中国顶级电动汽车论坛将于 5 月在加州举行
item.description: 中国汽车工程学会周日发表声明称，中国顶级电动汽车论坛--世界新能源汽车大会（WNEVC）将于 5 月 16-17 日在美国加州萨克拉门托举行。【原文：China's top electric vehicle forum, the World New Energy Vehicle Congress (WNEVC) will hold a conference in Sacramento, California from May 16-17, according to a statement from the Chinese Society of Automotive Engineers on Sunday.】

item.title: 加拿大空客 A220 喷气机工人拒绝公司第二次报价
item.description: 加拿大空客 A220 组装工人周日拒绝了公司提出的第二份报价，引发了人们对这种亏损飞机生产的担忧。【原文：Canadian Airbus A220 assembly workers on Sunday rejected a second company offer, raising concerns over production of the money-losing jet.】

item.title: 荷兰将遵守美国对华出口要求
item.description: 美国要求芯片制造巨头ASML停止为其出售给中国客户的一些设备提供服务，这让荷兰政府在外交和商业上都很头疼，但有迹象表明，它将继续在出口限制问题上与华盛顿保持一致。【原文：U.S. demands that chipmaking giant ASML stop servicing some equipment it has sold to Chinese customers are a diplomatic and business headache for the Dutch government, but signs are it will continue to align with Washington on export restrictions.】

item.title: 中国央行将设立 700 亿美元科技再贷款计划
item.description: 根据周日发布的一份声明，中国央行将设立一项 5000 亿元人民币（700 亿美元）的再贷款计划，以支持中国的科技行业。【原文：China's central bank will set up a 500 billion yuan ($70 billion) re-lending programme to support the country's science and technology sectors, according to a statement released on Sunday.】

item.title: X 挑战巴西 "强制 "封锁某些账户的命令
item.description: X Corp（推特的前身）周六表示，"迫于法院判决"，该公司在巴西封禁了某些流行账户，并禁止透露命令的细节。【原文：X Corp, formerly Twitter, has been "forced by court decisions" to block certain popular accounts in Brazil and is prohibited from giving details of the order, the company said on Saturday.】

item.title: Bilfinger 首席财务官告诉《Boersen-Zeitung》，Bilfinger 期待在美国和中东地区进行并购扩张
item.description: 德国工业服务供应商比尔芬格公司（Bilfinger）财务总监告诉《Boersen-Zeitung》，该公司正在考虑通过并购实现增长，并将中东和美国作为潜在的并购地。【原文：German industrial services provider Bilfinger is considering growing through mergers and acquisitions and is looking at the Middle East and United States as potential places to do so, the company's finance chief told Boersen-Zeitung.】

item.title: 加拿大皇家银行因未披露关系解雇首席财务官
item.description: 加拿大皇家银行周五表示，在 Nadine Ahn 离职后，该行任命 Katherine Gibson 为临时首席财务官，立即生效。【原文：Royal Bank of Canada on Friday said it appointed Katherine Gibson as interim Chief Financial Officer, effective immediately, following the departure of Nadine Ahn.】

item.title: 代理顾问敦促博雅银行分拆首席执行官和董事长职位
item.description: 投票代理顾问格拉斯-刘易斯（Glass Lewis）和机构股东服务公司（ISS）周五都敦促美国银行拆分布莱恩-莫伊尼汉（Brian Moynihan）担任的首席执行官和董事长职务。【原文：Proxy advisers Glass Lewis and Institutional Shareholder Services (ISS) on Friday both urged Bank of America to split the CEO and chairman roles held by Brian Moynihan.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，派拉蒙与天舞的交易将为 Shari Redstone 带来超过 20 亿美元的现金
item.description: 华尔街日报》周五援引知情人士的话报道称，根据正在讨论的交易条款，派拉蒙全球公司（Paramount Global）将在交易的第一步向控股股东莎莉-雷德斯通（Shari Redstone）提供超过 20 亿美元的现金。【原文：Paramount Global , under the terms of a deal being discussed, would give controlling shareholder Shari Redstone over $2 billion in cash in the first step of the transaction, the Wall Street Journal reported on Friday, citing people familiar with the situation said.】

item.title: 特斯拉对机器人轴的押注远未得到回报
item.description: 如果特斯拉将其小型汽车平台的工作重心转移到机器人轴上，那将是一个冒险的赌注，因为成功推出自动驾驶汽车还遥遥无期，而且这项技术还面临着工程和监管方面的障碍。【原文：Tesla is making a risky bet if it shifts efforts on its small-car vehicle platform to robotaxis as the successful introduction of vehicles that drive themselves is in the distant future, and the technology faces engineering and regulatory hurdles.】

item.title: 美国联邦航空局（FAA）对美联航安全事故进行调查，美联航推迟投资者日活动
item.description: 美国联合航空公司周五推迟了原定于下月初举行的投资者日活动，因为在发生多起安全事故后，美国联邦航空管理局对其进行了审查。【原文：United Airlines postponed on Friday its investor day which was scheduled for early next month, amid a review by the U.S. Federal Aviation Administration following multiple safety incidents.】

item.title: 苹果将允许欧洲的音乐流媒体应用程序链接到自己的网站进行购买
item.description: 苹果公司周五宣布采取措施，使欧洲经济区 App Store 上的音乐流媒体应用程序更容易告知用户购买数字服务的其他方式，以遵守欧盟的规定。【原文：Apple announced measures on Friday to make it easier for music streaming apps on its App Store in the European Economic Area to inform users of other ways to purchase digital services, as it looks to comply with a European Union mandate.】

item.title: 苹果要求美国上诉法院撤销 Apple Watch 进口禁令
item.description: 苹果公司周五敦促美国上诉法院推翻美国贸易法庭的裁决，即在与医疗监测技术公司 Masimo 的专利纠纷中禁止进口部分苹果手表。【原文：Apple urged a U.S. appeals court on Friday to overturn a U.S. trade tribunal's decision to ban imports of some Apple Watches in a patent dispute with medical-monitoring technology company Masimo .】

item.title: 马斯克称特斯拉将于 8 月 8 日推出 "机器人出租车
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克周五在社交媒体平台 X 上发文称，特斯拉将于 8 月 8 日推出 "Robotaxi"。【原文：Tesla will unveil 'Robotaxi' on Aug. 8, Elon Musk said in a post on social media platform X on Friday.】
